thobe.logfileviewer.plugin.api

Interface IPluginPreferences


  • public interface IPluginPreferences
    Author:
    Thomas Obenaus

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void load(java.util.prefs.Preferences pluginPrefRoot)
      This method will be called at startup.
      void save(java.util.prefs.Preferences pluginPrefRoot)
      This method will be called on shutdown.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        void load(java.util.prefs.Preferences pluginPrefRoot)
        This method will be called at startup. Implement this method loading your plugins preferences.
        e.g.:
        // retrieve the node called 'color-settings'
        Preferences root = pluginPrefRoot.node( "color-settings" );

        // retrieve the property 'text-color'
        String txtColor = root.get( "text-color", "black" );
        // retrieve the property 'background-color'
        String bgColor = root.get( "background-color", "white" );
        Parameters:
        pluginPrefRoot -

      • save

        void save(java.util.prefs.Preferences pluginPrefRoot)
        This method will be called on shutdown. Implement this method saving your plugins preferences.
        e.g.:
        // retrieve the node called 'color-settings'
        Preferences root = pluginPrefRoot.node( "color-settings" );

        // set the property 'text-color'
        String txtColor = root.put( "text-color", "green" );
        // set the property 'background-color'
        String bgColor = root.put( "background-color", "light-gray" );
        Parameters:
        pluginPrefRoot -
